name: Cats Hidden in Georgia
description:
Cats Hidden in Georgia is a very difficult but cute hidden object game set in the highly underrated country of Georgia.

100 cats are waiting for you to be discovered within a hand-drawn background.
Relax, thanks to the chill soundtrack

Found a cat? Click on it!

Features

🐾 1 Level, 100 cats
❔ Easter Eggs
💡 Hint System
⏰ Timer mode with leaderboard
⚙️ In-game Settings

TRAVELLIN CATS GIFT COLLECTION
